introduction: SYNOPSISChan-woo Park is the head of R&D at a high tech research institute. He returns to Korea to work for a new technology development project through his college friend Jung-hee's referral. When he sees Yoon Su-jin who meets him at the airport, Chan-woo is instantly attracted to her. Despite Jung-hee's repeated overtures, Chan-woo and Su-jin begin to live together. Their living arrangements are contractual with strict respect for each other's privacy and confidentiality. Yu-jin boards a plane to Paris but through the underhanded scheme of Jung-hee and her friend Man-su, she ends up stranded on a remote island in Thailand. Chan-woo realizes his love for Su-jin and decides to risk his life to save her. He succeeds in saving her and they reunite to re-ignite their romance.故事美国最先进的工程实验室的研究园Chanwoo（X）的负责人在大学少年的Carissa的建议被邀请到新的项目H组。公园Chanwoo保持未知感受到来自他们接我在机场暗恋尤恩·萨士（Y）的回归怀旧心态。尽管假虎和chanwoo和苏珊的坚持开始同居合同进行彻底的隐私，不干涉原则。泛欧doeja赛车与会者决定检查仅限于一个偏远的岛屿在泰国巴黎飞行欺骗的情节可以在假虎赛车手和他的同事出现。向苏珊Chanwoo怀有留恋被处死，它烧毁，两个人获救苏珊熊完美的爱情之果。
